name: Last hope (itch) (FTWRahul)
description:
Take control of an S-5497, Earth's finest Mech suit. 

The game is about discovery and exploration, only read the rest if you are unable to figure out how to do things.

Chain sequences of button presses followed by "Do the thing"(Execute) to make key actions.

Point and click, explore.

--Spoilers below--

Direction + Action will perform moves on the Mech.

Certain actions take multiple inputs, just experiment and you'll find everything.
Labels fade over time so keep the important ones close.

Moving

1 leg at a time, you have to go Left + Move + Fire, then Right + Move + Fire and so on.

If you do both Left and Right + Move + Fire, the mech will launch itself forward.

Rotating

Left/Right + Rotate +Fire.

Rockets

Left/Right + Rockets + Fire.

Everything else is to sell the narrative haha.

There is no winning.
